item.description: This is a new place for us to visit and a nice way to start the weekend. Theyâ€™re looking forward to our visit. Come join us for a great time and mingle with old and new friends! There is no charge. For info, call Josie 860-346-4936. Directions to 134 Berlin Road: I-91S to Exit 21, turn right onto Rt. 372W, facility about 700 feet up on right just past Burger King.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be inside at a table waiting to meet you.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
